captions.text: This moment for you, it's time
Turn up the music go ahead
Yeah, the burning tension so good
Bust your swag up so good
Come on, move the way you want
Fire up and make some rumors
Intoxicated by the moonlight, with you
I'm sorry to say goodbye, I don't want to let you go
Don't let go, just for today
but we're making trouble, uh-oh uh-oh
Like a lion in the jungle

comments.author: LTP EVERLAST

comments.text:
+LTP EVERLAST are you really crediting BAP for coming up with the phrase 
"the roof is on fire"? The first time it was used was when Rock Master 
Scott and The Dynamic Three made a song with the name "The Roof is on fire" 
in 1984. I hope you understand that this is probably before BAP was even 
born. The you proceed to claim that them having superpowers in a MV is 
copying yet another group... Newsflash: that concept has been used more 
times than I can count, and countless times before EXO were even a thing.

If you find something authentic that other groups did which JJCC, or any 
other group for that matter, flat out copied THEN feel free to point it out.
